pages.text: $(item)Alchemical Ash$() is, simply put, purified $(l:intro/impure_ash)Impure Ash$(). Through the $(l:ritualism/purification)Ritual of Purification$(), the impurities are cleared, leaving pure, distilled, alchemically charged essence behind.$(br2)While its uses are somewhat limited in its raw form, it can be used to construct a $(l:artificing/divining_rod)Divining Rod$().
